about_the_game:
Auto Dungeon Monsters is a 2D Auto-battler with roguelite elements. Battle using monsters you acquire throughout the dungeon and level them up by sacrificing them to their own kind. Reach the end of the dungeon and defeat the boss to receive treasures to use in future delves.

You have gained the ability to link your soul to that of a monsters, enabling you to bend its will to your own, and have set your eyes toward the treasures hidden within the ancient dungeons of Gavaria.

Features

  • Create a party of monsters that interact with each other to boost their power
  • Interact with dozens of different monsters, each with three unique stages
  • Find treasures that can aid you in future dungeon delves
  • Fight interesting boss monsters to delve to deeper floors
  • Hand-crafted AI parties to battle against

You have gained the ability to link your soul to that of a monsters, enabling you to bend its will to your own, and have set your eyes toward the treasures hidden within the ancient dungeons of Gavaria.

name: Auto Dungeon Monsters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Use the very same monsters that stand in your way to help you delve deeper into the dungeon, in this auto-battler roguelite. Form your party of monsters, level them up, and combine them to find the best combinations!
